thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Sanderson Farms Q1 Earnings Per Share $2.24

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sanderson Farms Q1 Earnings Per Share $2.24
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Sanderson Farms Inc:
* SANDERSON FARMS, INC. REPORTS RESULTS FOR FIRST QUARTER OF FISCAL 2018
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.24 * Q1 SALES $771.9 MILLION VERSUS $688.3 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.10, REVENUE VIEW $763.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* ‍NET INCOME FOR QUARTER REFLECTS A ONE-TIME NON-CASH TAX BENEFIT OF $37.5 MILLION​
* SANDERSON FARMS - ‍CONSTRUCTION AT NEW TYLER, TEXAS, COMPLEX CONTINUES ON SCHEDULE TO OPEN IN FIRST CALENDAR QUARTER OF 2019​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
